name: Pit Boss
description:
Dodge the dice thrown by the evil Pit Boss- and throw your own at his minions!
( but be sure to pick up after yourself...)

WASD to move, Space bar to Jump, Left Click to shoot dice

Software Used:

  • Godot 4 Alpha 10
  • Blender 3.2.1
  • FL Studio 20.9.2
  • Pentacom's BitFontMaker2

Art/Sound Credits:

  • Music Track by Threeli
  • Sound Effects by Kenney
  • Icon Sprites from Game-Icons.net
    • lorc
    • skoll
    • delapouite
    • sbed
